doc:
Brooke Adams (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooke_Adams_(actress) 0 Brooke Adams (born February 8, 1949) is an American actress. She is best known for her film roles as Abby in Days of Heaven (1978), Elizabeth Driscoll in Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1978) and Sarah Bracknell in The Dead Zone (1983). Brooke_Adams ( born February_8_,_1949 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_film_roles as Abby in Days of Heaven_(_1978_) , Elizabeth_Driscoll in Invasion of the_Body_Snatchers ( 1978_) and Sarah_Bracknell in The_Dead_Zone_(_1983_) .
